lyrics.lyric: Just A Kid
lyrics.tlyric: 只是个孩子

lyrics.lyric: Hey, I'm just a kid, I don't need money
lyrics.tlyric: 嘿！我只是个孩子，我对钱不屑一顾

lyrics.lyric: Little lost, but one day they will talk of me
lyrics.tlyric: 有点小失落，但总有一天人们会提起我

lyrics.lyric: I'll have the world, hope you're waiting when I'm through with it
lyrics.tlyric: 我将拥有这个世界，希望你能等我完成这个梦想

lyrics.lyric: Oh, I'm coming home to ya
lyrics.tlyric: 噢，我正要回家找你

lyrics.lyric: Hey, we're just kids, don't it feel lovely
lyrics.tlyric: 嘿！我们只是孩子，不觉得很可爱吗

lyrics.lyric: We sip rum and write songs, 'til we feel funny
lyrics.tlyric: 我们呷着朗姆酒，写着歌，直到觉得有趣

lyrics.lyric: Outside 'til sunrise, we ain't finished
lyrics.tlyric: 我们彻夜游玩，直到日出都没有结束

lyrics.lyric: Oh, I'm coming home to ya
lyrics.tlyric: 噢，我正要回家找你

lyrics.lyric: And I remember swinging high on the playground
lyrics.tlyric: 我还记得在操场上把秋千荡得很高

lyrics.lyric: Side by side on the slide, only way down
lyrics.tlyric: 我们一起沿着滑梯一路滑下

lyrics.lyric: And I can see us running around the house
lyrics.tlyric: 我还记得我们在房子里跑来跑去

lyrics.lyric: You'd be like chasing me until my breath ran outta my mind
lyrics.tlyric: 你像在追赶我，直到我精疲力尽，喘不过气

lyrics.lyric: Now I'm hearing deadbeat lies
lyrics.tlyric: 但现在我只能听到死气沉沉的谎言

lyrics.lyric: Like how everything I dream about will never be mine
lyrics.tlyric: 就像我梦想的一切永远不会是我的

lyrics.lyric: And how everything I'm reaching for, it don't pay a dime
lyrics.tlyric: 我所追求的一切都不值得

lyrics.lyric: It don't matter what you say to me, You know I'mma try and sing
lyrics.tlyric: 不管你对我说什么，你知道的，我都会努力唱歌

lyrics.lyric: Hey, I'm just a kid, I don't need money
lyrics.tlyric: 嘿！我只是个孩子，我对钱不屑一顾

lyrics.lyric: Little lost, but one day they will talk of me
lyrics.tlyric: 有点小失落，但总有一天人们会提起我

lyrics.lyric: I'll have the world, hope you're waiting when I'm through with it
lyrics.tlyric: 我将拥有这个世界，希望你能等我完成这个梦想

lyrics.lyric: Oh, I'm coming home to ya
lyrics.tlyric: 噢，我正要回家找你

lyrics.lyric: Hey, we're just kids, don't it feel lovely
lyrics.tlyric: 嘿！我们只是孩子，不觉得很可爱吗

lyrics.lyric: We sip rum and write songs, 'til we feel funny
lyrics.tlyric: 我们呷着朗姆酒，写着歌，直到觉得有趣

lyrics.lyric: Outside 'til sunrise, we ain't finished
lyrics.tlyric: 我们彻夜游玩，直到日出都没有结束

lyrics.lyric: Hey ma, give me five more minutes, like, I'm like
lyrics.tlyric: 妈妈，再给我五分钟，大概，也许

lyrics.lyric: Oh, I'm coming home to ya
lyrics.tlyric: 噢，我正要回家找你

lyrics.lyric: Scared of thorns
lyrics.tlyric: 因为害怕被刺伤

lyrics.lyric: So I never smelled the roses
lyrics.tlyric: 所以我从未闻过玫瑰的花香

lyrics.lyric: Always let the bullshit dominate my focus
lyrics.tlyric: 总被狗屁东西扰乱我的心绪

lyrics.lyric: Wore the mask of who I'm supposed to be
lyrics.tlyric: 戴上面具，伪装成我应该成为的人

lyrics.lyric: Doc would always say, "Son, take a dose for me"
lyrics.tlyric: 大夫总是说：孩子，给我拿一剂

lyrics.lyric: But the medicine's been making me a broken me
lyrics.tlyric: 但是药物让我变得支离破碎

lyrics.lyric: Dreaming all day about the doings of a doper me
lyrics.tlyric: 我这个瘾君子整天做着不切实际的梦

lyrics.lyric: How I'd sit up on my throne and have the globe for me
lyrics.tlyric: 我将如何坐在我的王座上，如何拥有全世界

lyrics.lyric: Don't know why I never let nobody close to me
lyrics.tlyric: 不知道为什么，我从不让任何人靠近我

lyrics.lyric: So come close to me
lyrics.tlyric: 所以请靠近我一点

lyrics.lyric: And look me in the eye so that hopefully
lyrics.tlyric: 充满希望地看着我

lyrics.lyric: I can save you from that shit, you ain't supposed to feel
lyrics.tlyric: 你不要有这种想法，我可以救你于水火

lyrics.lyric: While you go and save the world, take some notes for me
lyrics.tlyric: 当你去拯救世界时，给我带些话

lyrics.lyric: Come close to me, and sing
lyrics.tlyric: 请靠近我，然后唱

lyrics.lyric: Hey, I'm just a kid, I don't need money
lyrics.tlyric: 嘿！我只是个孩子，我对钱不屑一顾

lyrics.lyric: Little lost, but one day they will talk of me
lyrics.tlyric: 有点小失落，但总有一天人们会提起我

lyrics.lyric: I'll have the world, hope you're waiting when I'm through with it
lyrics.tlyric: 我将拥有这个世界，希望你能等我完成这个梦想

lyrics.tlyric: 噢，我正要回家找你

lyrics.tlyric: 我们呷着朗姆酒，写着歌，直到觉得有趣

lyrics.tlyric: 我们彻夜游玩，直到日出都没有结束

lyrics.tlyric: 妈妈，再给我五分钟，大概

lrc.lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : M. Halper/E. Sones/K. Milledge II

[00:10.53]I'll have the world,hope you're waiting when I'm through with it
[00:13.46]Ah,I'm coming home to ya

[00:26.75]And I remember swinging high on the playground
[00:29.42]Side by side on the slide on the way down
[00:31.94]And I could see us running 'round the house
[00:33.96]It'd be like chasing me until my breath ran out of my mind
[00:37.90]Now I'm hearing deadbeat lies
[00:39.44]Like how everything I dream about will never be mine
[00:41.94]And how everything I'm reaching for won't pay the time
[00:44.75]It don't matter what you say to me,you know I'm gonna try and sing

tlyric.lyric:
[by:TruelyTree]
[00:05.14]嘿！我只是个孩子，金钱我不屑一顾
[00:07.92]目前有点小失意，但总有一天人们会谈论起我
[00:10.53]我将拥有这个世界，希望你能看见
[00:13.46]啊，现在我要回家了
[00:15.97]嗨！我只是个可爱的小男孩而已
[00:18.52]朗姆酒配上我们的歌，直到感觉欢愉
[00:21.20]彻夜游玩，至日出仍不停歇
[00:23.90]噢，是时候回家了
[00:26.75]还记得把秋千荡到最高处的感觉
[00:29.42]我们一起沿着滑梯滑下
[00:31.94]围绕着我们的房子尽情奔跑
[00:33.96]幻想追逐着直到精疲力尽
[00:37.90]但这一切都不曾存在
[00:39.44]就像我梦想的一切永远不会属于我
[00:41.94]而我所追求的一切都只是浪费时间
[00:44.75]不管你对我说什么，我都会努力尝试，你知道的，因为
[00:47.95]嘿！我只是个孩子，金钱我不屑一顾
[00:50.35]目前有点小失意，但总有一天人们会谈论起我
[00:53.12]我将拥有这个世界，希望你都能看见
[00:55.96]啊，现在我要回家了
[00:58.72]嗨！我只是个可爱的小男孩而已
[01:01.25]朗姆酒配上我们的歌，直到感觉欢愉
[01:03.90]彻夜游玩，至日出仍不停歇
[01:06.94]妈妈，请再给我多一点时间
[01:17.14]我正在回家的路上
[01:19.95]从未闻过蔷薇的花香，因为我害怕被刺伤
[01:22.80]总被流言扰乱心绪
[01:25.28]我真是个糟糕的孩子
[01:27.72]爸爸总是说：“儿子，给我点支烟”
[01:30.00]尼古丁麻痹了我，心绪支离破碎
[01:32.75]如果我成了瘾君子，又会如何呢？
[01:34.97]我将如何为自己加冕？
[01:37.97]不知道为什么，我总是刻意疏离
[01:40.42]请靠我近一点
[01:42.15]充满希望地看着我好吗
[01:44.71]我可以救你于水火
[01:47.39]当你去拯救世界的时候，帮我传达一句话
[01:49.94]请靠近我，为我吟唱
[01:52.00]嘿！我只是个孩子，金钱我不屑一顾
[01:54.94]目前有点小失意，但总有一天人们会谈论起我
[01:56.94]我将拥有这个世界，希望你都能看见
[01:59.94]啊，现在我要回家了
